articles.author: Graeme Green
articles.title: Superman towers over the Kremlin: Reiner Riedler's best photograph - The Guardian
articles.description: ‘This is from my Fake Holidays series, taken at the Kremlin Palace hotel in Turkey. I found an entertainer dressed as Superman and asked him to pose by the pool. You’d end up in prison if you did this in the real Red Square’
articles.content: This photo is part of my Fake Holidays series. At the beginning of the project, more than 15 years ago, I went to Lara Beach in Antalya, Turkey, where there is one luxury five-star hotel after anothe… [+9534 chars]

articles.description: Gosling embarked on a relationship with Mendes, 49, after the pair played troubled lovers in critically acclaimed 2012 drama The Place Beyond The Pines.
